snippet.title: Release Me Trailer |  Our First Indie Android Game
snippet.description:
Release Me is an Indie Android game developed by Indie Studio AppGallery.

In Release Me, player takes control of a football and face various enemies and deadly traps, in a variety of well thought-out stages. Player can collect points, power ups and ultimately a key to release the locked power cube, upon whose collection, the player wins. Also, beware the time is fixed for each stage and player will require precision and timing to cross each stage.

It is AppGallery's first android game, which was made using Unity3D. Hope you will like it.

It is live and available on Google PlayStore at this link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.appgallery.releaseme

Music used: A New Beginning by Bensound.

Follow us on:
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/appgalleryofficial/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/appgalleryofficial/
